title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - NFL Week 2 Picks and Betting Breakdown
itunes:title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - NFL Week 2 Picks and Betting Breakdown
description:
In Fake Questions, Real Answers, Colin names his favorite non-starting NFL QB, explains why USC waited before firing Clay Helton, and calls out the team's fan base that frustrates him the most. Then Colin makes his NFL Week 2 picks and Action Network CCO Chad Millman tells him whether they're sharp or square. They make their picks for Cowboys/Chargers (11:00), Raiders/Steelers (13:00), Patriots/Jets (15:00), Rams/Colts (21:00), Saints/Panthers (24:00), Bengals/Bears (27:00), Chiefs/Ravens (30:00), Niners/Eagles (32:00), Bills/Dolphins (34:00), and Falcons/Bucs (35:00).

Make sure you follow Colin and The Volume on Twitter for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
